Message:
I came home to hear
laughter coming from inside.

While I was away,
Mother’s health had improved.

Some man I didn’t know
had been taking care of her.

She still thought I was Urd,
and was convinced that Belldandy
was lost in a miscarriage...

But without warning,
she said to me,
“Let’s go our separate ways.
Live your life as you like.”

Up until now,
I believed I had been
supporting Mother in
my own way.

Everything I ever did for her...
It all meant...nothing...

In the end, she never again
saw me as Skuld.

This “Skuld” person...
I wonder if she really exists...
